key.name: ultrawide-only
key.description: When turned on, any monitor with a ratio less <= 16:9 will be treated as a 2x2 grid.

key.name: use-maximize
key.summary: Turn on/off use of maximizing windows
key.description: When on, certain windows that won't resize full screen like Terminal will, however animations may occur between tile shifts.

key.name: use-minimize
key.summary: Turn use of minimizing windows on/off
key.description: When off, windows will never be minimized.

key.name: preview
key.description: When on, dragging windows with the mouse will allow placement into the grid.

key.name: double-width
key.summary: Use double width previews on sides in 4 column mode
key.description: When on, dragging a window to the side will preview 2 columns wide instead of 1.

key.name: distance
key.summary: Pixels from edge to start preview

key.name: delay
key.summary: Delay in ms before preview displays
